mapper.sql: FID, FCREATETIME, FCREATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FLASTMODIFYUSERID, FADDRESS, FPOSTCODE, FPROVINCE, FCITY, FAREA, FADDRESSTYPE, FMEMBERID, FSTATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS (FID, FCREATETIME, FCREATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FLASTMODIFYUSERID, FADDRESS, FPOSTCODE, FPROVINCE, FCITY, FAREA, FADDRESSTYPE, FMEMBERID, FSTATUS) values (#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS
FID,
FCREATETIME,
FCREATEUSERID,
FLASTUPDATETIME,
FLASTMODIFYUSERID,
FADDRESS,
FPOSTCODE,
FPROVINCE,
FCITY,
FAREA,
FADDRESSTYPE,
FMEMBERID,
FSTATUS,
#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS
FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{record.flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FADDRESS = #{record.faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPOSTCODE = #{record.fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPROVINCE = #{record.fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCITY = #{record.fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAREA = #{record.farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FADDRESSTYPE = #{record.faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMEMBERID = #{record.fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FSTATUS = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS set FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{record.flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FADDRESS = #{record.faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPOSTCODE = #{record.fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPROVINCE = #{record.fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCITY = #{record.fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAREA = #{record.farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FADDRESSTYPE = #{record.faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMEMBERID = #{record.fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FSTATUS = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FADDRESS = #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPOSTCODE = #{fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPROVINCE = #{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCITY = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAREA = #{farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FADDRESSTYPE = #{faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMEMBERID = #{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FSTATUS = #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS set FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FADDRESS = #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPOSTCODE = #{fpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPROVINCE = #{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCITY = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAREA = #{farea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FADDRESSTYPE = #{faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMEMBERID = #{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FSTATUS = #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select t_cust_shuttleaddress.FID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FCREATETIME, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FCREATEUSERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FLASTUPDATETIME, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FLASTMODIFYUSERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FADDRESS, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FPOSTCODE, substrb(t_crm_province.fname,1,30) as FPROVINCE, substrb(t_crm_city.fname,1,30) as FCITY, substrb(t_crm_area.fname,1,30) as FAREA, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FADDRESSTYPE, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FMEMBERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FSTATUS from T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS left join t_crm_province on t_crm_province.fnumber = t_cust_shuttleaddress.fprovince and t_crm_province.fstatus = '1' left join t_crm_city on t_crm_city.fnumber = t_cust_shuttleaddress.fcity and t_crm_city.fprovinceid = t_crm_province.fnumber and t_crm_city.fstatus = '1' left join t_crm_area on t_crm_area.fnumber = t_cust_shuttleaddress.farea and t_crm_area.fcityid = t_crm_city.fnumber and t_crm_area.fstatus = '1' where T_CUST_SHUTTLEADDRESS.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select t_cust_shuttleaddress.FID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FCREATETIME, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FCREATEUSERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FLASTUPDATETIME, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FLASTMODIFYUSERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FADDRESS, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FPOSTCODE, substrb(t_crm_province.fname,1,30) as FPROVINCE, substrb(t_crm_city.fname,1,30) as FCITY, substrb(t_crm_area.fname,1,30) as FAREA, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FADDRESSTYPE, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FMEMBERID, t_cust_shuttleaddress.FSTATUS from t_cust_shuttleaddress left join t_crm_province on t_crm_province.fid = t_cust_shuttleaddress.fprovince left join t_crm_city on t_crm_city.fid = t_cust_shuttleaddress.fcity left join t_crm_area on t_crm_area.fid = t_cust_shuttleaddress.farea where Fmemberid = #{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t_cust_shuttleaddress.FSTATUS in ('0','2')

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from t_cust_custbasedata join t_cust_shuttleaddress on t_cust_shuttleaddress.fmemberid = t_cust_custbasedata.fid join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid where t_cust_shuttleaddress.fid = #{fmemberid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
